name: Magnet Board
description:
What if games used 100% of the keyboard 🤯 Imagine all the combinations you could do, gameplay would be so deep and complex, with intricate interactions between every key that enriches gameplay beyond belief

Yeah no that's not how it works bud

This is a silly experimental project that I just had to make for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 (theme was Roll of the Dice). Submitted with 26 hours to spare 🤧

Close call man

---

How To Play

  • Every key you see on screen can be pressed on your IRL keyboard
  • To beat the level, set all dice to 1 at the same time

Credit where credit's due:

  • Dice model by muhammad_mlahim
  • Keyboard by Apple
